snippet.title: Touhou 東方海恵堂 ～ Marine Benefit Extra Stage (Reimu)
snippet.description:
The Extra Stage for this game is finally done.

MB is a fangame that jumped on the bandwagon that Touhou 13 was going to be a water-themed game... thereby probably making any new touhou game absolutely not water- themed.

You gain lives and bombs in this game by picking up the H and O items, these will lower the cursors on the left of the screen. When they reach their markers, you will get a bomb or a life respectably. The H cursor also functions as your POC. You also get lives after getting certain amounts of graze.

The stage itself is not that tricky once you know what to do a bit. A few well-placed bombs will also give you a lot of advantages. Like at the start to get a lot of H and O parts and using one during the circling fairy part will completely neuter that section. 
The first card of the midboss takes way too long and the last you really need to do really up close to not get walled. Second is weird.

As for the boss itself, she isn't that bad although the nonspells can be tricky until you get used to their movement. The second card is more bark than bite, it's just delayed movement.
The third one is really cool though, a lot of fun to dodge. 
The first survival seems to be take bullets with the white aura and release said bullets with the black aura, I kinda mess it up a bit here. I don't think I have to say how stupid the second survival is. 
Second to last is really easy as long as you dodge to the left instead of the right (hurrrr), once you dodge right you're kind of fucked. And the last can be hard as the dead ones will haunt you around. But bringing all three to the verge of dieing will neuter that aspect too.

Apparently the spellcards for the extra boss are completely different depending on which character you choose. Didn't know that!

Download link:
http://nekofla.web.fc2.com/game/th_kaikeidou/top.html
(Just download everything in the orange boxes and dump them in the same folder).
